潫字的基本解释

潫
wān
〔奫（
y憂 ）潫〕（水）回旋的样子，如“泓澄潫潫。”

潫字的汉语字典释义

[①]［wān］
［《廣韻》烏關切，平删，影。］
［《廣韻》於權切，平仙，影。］
［《廣韻》於緣切，平仙，影。］
见“奫潫”。

潫字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　潫； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页650第10
【廣韻】【集韻】?烏關切，音彎。水深廣貌。　又【左思·吳都賦】泓澄?潫。【註】?潫，迴復之貌。　又【廣韻】於緣切【集韻】縈緣切，?音娟。義同。　又【廣韻】【集韻】?紆權切，音蝹。義同。一曰大水。

潫字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
潫字的起名意思

暂无。

潫
Basic explanation of words
潫
wān
〔奫（
y worry) 潫] (water) the whirling appearance, such as "Hong Cheng 潫潫."
潫
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［wān］
["Guangyun" Wu caring, flat deletion, shadow. ]
["Guangyun" Yu Quanqie, Pingxian, Shadow. ]
["Guangyun" Yu Yuanqie, Pingxian, Shadow. ]
See "奫潫".
潫
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Siji 1] [Shui Character Department] 　潫; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 650 No. 10
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Wu is concerned, sound bends. The water is deep and wide.　 [Zuo Si·Wu Du Fu] Hong Cheng? Shu. [Note]? Shu, the appearance of the reply.　[Guangyun] Yuyuanqie [Jiyun] Yingyuanqie,? Yinjuan. The same meaning.　[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Right cut, sound chrysanthemum. The same meaning. One is big water.
